item.title: Riot in My Heart
item.description: [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/thousandfold.md#i-the-spectral-guise-vyl-wnanory|I’m not going to change my mind]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/thousandfold.md#i-the-spectral-guise-vyl-wnanory|I can’t listen to your fuckin’ lies]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/thousandfold.md#i-the-spectral-guise-vyl-wnanory|We stand together for a free life]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/everything_remains_as_it_never_was/thousandfold.
